item.author: We Are Gurus
item.appdesc:
BonjourMadame is one of the first french blog to introduce the "daily pic" concept in France. Everyday at 10am, a new picture is published. It has lounched a real underground trend with now more than 80 clones, publishing a picture a day and using the 'bonjour' prefix (BonjourGeek, BonjourChatroulette, BonjourPanda, ...).

Since it's Tumblr-based, we use iUI for front-end and a server-side Tumblr API parser to get all contents.
